com.topcoder.rules.management.bean
Class RulesManagementServicesBean

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.topcoder.rules.management.bean.RulesManagementServicesBean
public class RulesManagementServicesBean
extends java.lang.Object

The EJB class which manages connections to the RuleSources.

See Also:
RulesManagementServices

Initializes the bean to work with the RuleSource for the given RuleSet.

ruleSetID - The unique identifier of the RuleSet
Throws:
EJBException - if the requested RuleSource is unavailable.

After this method is called, one may re-initialize the bean.

java.rmi.RemoteException
